news.name: Тезюрар поезд Нукусгача боради
news.description: Йўловчиларнинг Тошкентдан Урганчгача етиб бориш вақти 14 соатдан 6 соатга, Тошкент билан Нукус ўртасидаги қатнов вақти эса 16 соатдан 7 соатгача қисқаради.

news.name: Russia-Ukraine updates: NATO backs Kyiv’s future membership
news.description: This blog is now closed, thank you for joining us. These were the updates on the Russia-Ukraine war on Tuesday, November 29.

news.name: Fifa world cup Qatar 2022.
news.description: Witness the action at the FIFA World Cup™ when you fly to Doha with Qatar Airways, the Official Airline of the Journey and enjoy an unrivalled on-board experience.
